meanings.definition: The act of a goaltender stopping the puck from entering the goal.
meanings.sent1: During the game, the goaltendings by the goalie prevented the other team from scoring.
meanings.sent2: His quick goaltendings saved the team from losing the match.
meanings.sent3: The goaltendings were so impressive that the crowd cheered loudly.
meanings.sent4: Her goaltendings were like a brick wall, impossible to get past.
meanings.sent5: The goaltendings were the highlight of the game, showcasing his skill and agility.
